titles.title: Have Thine Own Way Lord (familiar great)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Have Thine own way Lord Have Thine own way Thou art the Potter I am the clay Mould me and make me After Thy will While I am waiting Yielded and still{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Have Thine own way Lord Have Thine own way Search me and try me Master today Whiter than snow Lord Wash me just now As in Thy presence Humbly I bow{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Have Thine own way Lord Have Thine own way Wounded and weary Help me I pray Power all power Surely is Thine Touch me and heal me Savior divine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Have Thine own way Lord Have Thine own way Hold o'er my being Absolute sway Fill with Thy Spirit Till all shall see Christ only always Living in me{/lang-eng}
